basics.name: HUNG LE VAN
basics.label:
- Be aggressive with my jobs to meet deadline
- Desire to becom #1 in networking area
- Truthfulness and diligence are my character

work.company: Viettel Network - Viettel Group, Hanoi Vietnam
work.desc: Designing and Rolling out Unified MPLS IP Network Project - The biggest IP Network in Vietnam.

work.company: Technical Department - Viettel Group, Hanoi Vietnam
work.desc:
Key Achivements:
- Plan, design and intergrate Multiscreen system for 3 million television subscriber (broadcast + IPTV + OTT -- All services in a single platform).
- Deploying GPON network for 6 million broadband customer.

work.company: Viettel America - Viettel Group, Miami/Fort Lauderdale Area
work.desc:
Key achivements:
- Design and Integrate VoIP systems for VoIP services (topup).

work.company: Viettel Network - Viettel Group, Hanoi Vietnam
work.desc:
Key Achivements:
 - Design and successfully integrate IP backbone network for mobile services (40 millions subscribers) using Cisco Product (ASR 9K, CRS3, S6509).
 - Operate IP Backbone Network for fixed services (1 millions subscribers).

work.company: Viettel Technology - Viettel Group, Hanoi Vietnam
work.desc:
Key achievements:
 - Designing and integrating HD Video Conferencing System for Viettel Cooperation using Polycom products (2007)
- Designing and integrating HD Video Conferencing System for Viettel Cambodia using Polycom products (2008)

education.studyType: Master's degree, Network and Security Management
